298567.軍司令部に到着した <pc>たちは\nエテーネ王国の 慰霊碑を訪れた。すると\n:
Having arrived at the Royal Army Headquarters, and co. visit the Ethene Kingdom's memorial. Not long after, Mereade
also decides to visit.

298568.「<kyodai>……。\n 弟のために わざわざ ありがとう。:
<kyodai>...
Thank you for everything you've done to
help my brother.

298569.「ううん。おいらこそ もっと早く\n ここに来られたら よかったんだけど。:
No worries. It's me who wishes that I could've
come here sooner.

298570.「……あれからね。\n おいらも 色々あったんだよ クオード。:
...since then, I've been through a lot too,
Quard.

298571.「何千年も 時渡りを くり返しながら\n 心のどこかで 思ってたんだ。:
It's been stuck in the back of my mind for
thousands of years during my travels
through time.

298572.「おいらさえ あきらめなければ……\n 君が あやまちを起こさない未来に\n た:
As long as I didn't give up...I thought we
could've reached a future where you
didn't make the same mistakes.

298573.「でも そんなの 思い上がりでさ。\n エテーネの村の悲劇を 止められないのと同:
But that's hubris. Just like how I couldn't
prevent the tragedy in Ethene Village...
Reality...it's a really cruel thing.

298574.「……今でも 悔やんでる。\n もっと 他の方法が あったんじゃないか。\n 君:
I still regret it to this day... I always
wondered if there was another way. Could I
have done something for you?

298575.「私も……。私も あなたと同じです。\n あやまちを犯した人を 救えずに\n ず:
I...I'm the same way. I've been feeling
regretful for not being able to save someone
who made a mistake.

298576.「私のお姉様は 取り返しのつかない 罪を犯し\n 最後は 贖罪のように 散ってい:
My sister committed an unforgiveable crime,
and in the end...scattered away as if it were
her way of seeking redemption.

298577.「それでも お姉様が 世界を守るために戦った\n 強くて 優しい人だったことは:
Even so, it doesn't change the fact that she was a strong, yet gentle person who fought to protect this world. I want to carry on her
memory.

298578.「あなたも どうか 失った人の思いを\n 大切にしてあげてくださいね……。:
You too should cherish the memories of those
you have lost...

298579.「うん……おいらも忘れない。\n クオードが 大切にしていたものを。:
Yeah...I won't forget either. I'll always
remember how much Quard meant to me.

298580.「我らは ここに誓う。\n 自らのチカラで 時を生き\n よりよき未来へ 向かわ:
We vow, here and now...to live on with our
own strength, and strive for a better
future...

298581.「クオードも そう 望んでいたと思う。: I'm sure Quard would've wanted that, too.

298582.「あなたが遺した 思いと未来……\n 私が 継いでいくわ クオード。:
Quard... I will carry on the feelings and the
future you left behind.

298584.<pc>たちは それぞれに\n命を落とした者たちを 思い浮かべながら\n静かに:
<pc> prayed silently, remembering
those who lost their lives...

298585.メレアーデは 涙をぬぐって 去っていった。\nクオードを悼むことができた <ky:
Mereade left while wiping away her tears.
<kyodai>, after mourning for Quard,
promised to help once more.

298586.現・自由人の集落にいる ワグミカを訪ね\n時渡りと錬金術の 専門家として\n<k:
Go to the present day Freedom Village and
introduce <kyodai> as an expert in
time travel and alchemy to Wagmika.
